runs.comm: length ball outside off goes for a wide
length ball on off, defends it back to the bowler
full and outside off, driven and thick outside edge goes past point for three
short of length ball outside off, punched to cover
length ball shaping away outside off, Dilshan drives and misses
on length outside off and swinging away, Dilshan leaves and it bounces off to the keeper
length ball on middle and leg and Dilshan flicks it past mid-on for four
big appeal for lbw as Mahela took a step down to defend and the ball hit the pat outside off after pitching in front of the stumps

gets him this time even though Mahela is not happy. It pitched around leg, just marginally outside, was going straight and this big appeal is replied in affirmative from the umpire. Mahela shakes his head while walking off
on length outside off, pushed to cover by Kusal
that's a biggie! On length outside off and Kusal slams it over the long-on boundary. He got a bit of room and swung his arms freely to send it all the way
short ball into the batsman, pulled fine to short fine leg
dropped at short fine leg! Much shorter this time and Perera pulled again, it went to the fielder's right and he stuck his hands out without moving much and the ball slipped out
going down the leg side, guides it fine down the leg side for four
short of length outside off, drives on the up to cover point
short ball on middle and leg, Kusal pulls but can't connect and hits him above the hip
full and outside off, out of the ground again. You can't pitch it up to him and give him room. It was in the zone and he smashed it straight over the bowler's head for another six
punched for four more! It was outside off with the angle and he merely punched it between cover point and cover using the pace of the ball
on length and going away form outside off, big heave form Kusal and he misses
full just outside off, Dilshan slashes and a thick edge goes to third man
on length outside off, pushed down to mid-on
almost in the block hole as it's a low full toss outside off, blocked by Kusal
outside off and this one's slogged over mid-on for four! The fielder tried to get his hand to it but it went way over his head
full and outside off, this drive has sent the ball high in the air, but is just clears mid-off and he gets two more
on length around off and that's whipped effortlessly by Kusal to the deep midwicket boundary. There was a fielder there but it went too quick and beat him easily
on length outside off, defends it to point
on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on for one
on length around off, pushes it on the leg side with soft hands
short of length on middle, Dilshan misses the sweep and the bowler appeals for lbw but it was too high
connects this time and right from the middle! It was a touch fuller on leg and he swept it with sweet timing for four to the fine leg boundary
low full toss on leg, clipped straight to midwicket
short of length angling away from off, pushed to long-on
short ball on off and Dilshan picks it up early to pull it for four to the midwicket boundary
short ball around off, Dilshan moved across down on one knee and tried to scoop it over the keeper's head but missed it completely
full and outside off, driven to mid-off and a misfield from McClenaghan concedes an easy single
short of length on leg, jabbed towards midwicket uppishly for one
angled in from length on off, they take a quick single on the leg side and Dilshan keeps the strike
full and outside off, driven powerfully to wide long-off
short of length on leg, tucked to deep backward square leg
on length around off and middle, turned on the leg side for one
short of length outside leg again, clipped to deep backward square leg and that's the 50 partnership
full on middle, chips it back to the bowler who dives forward but it falls just short
on length and going into him, Dilshan defends and it goes past the keeper for leg byes
full on the pads, worked to deep midwicket with a step down the track
pitched up on off, driven firmly through the covers but for only one
short of length outside off, Kusal pulled with a lot of power and went into the hands of del midwicket after a bounce
drives the full ball to sweeper cover
full on the stumps, pushed down to long-on and Dilshan says no for the second
on length outside off, driven softly towards cover for one more
clipped to deep midkwicket by Dilshan and there's time only for one
dropped by Munro now! It was going down leg, Kusal slogged it high in the air, Munro got under it at deep fine leg but couldn't hold on it. Maybe just took his eyes off the ball at the end
clipped to midwicket from length on leg
full on middle and leg, comes down to drive it to long-on
slightly quicker outside off, Dilshan cuts off the back foot to point
slower through the air, Dilshan cuts it early and nearly chops it on, but gets it on his pad
length delivery outside off, cuts it late off the back foot to third man
length ball toward middle stump, Dilshan defends and it goes to fine leg with an inside edge
full on middle, driven down with full face of the bat to long-off
pulled and it races to the boundary! The bouncer was aimed towards middle and he pulled it within no time to the square leg boundary
short again but slower and outside off, Kusal keeps it down on the leg side by closing the face of the bat
full delivery outside off is driven to sweeper cover
flighted full toss is driven down to long-off
full on the pads, clipped on the leg side for one
flighted on off and middle and Dilshan sweeps it right in between deep square leg and midwicket for four
full on the stumps, pushed down easily to long-on
on leg stump, takes a step down and drives it to wide long on for one to bring up his fifty off 31 balls
full outside off, driven uppishly in the air to point after a bounce
low full toss on middle, pushed down to long-on
full outside off and Dilshan chops it late wide of short third man for four. Wherever there's a gap, these two are finding it
full on middle and off, clipped to long-on for one
more luck for Kusal! He came down the ground to launch it on the leg side and gets an inside edge as it goes past the keeper on the leg side for four more
take a step down to push it to long-on
low full toss on leg, clipped to long-on for one more
full outside off, Dilshan chops it onto his leg in an attempt to slog it
full on off, punched down to mid-off for another dot ball
short of length outside off, Dilshan guides it to point and it's another dot ball, oh it's not! The fielder from point has a shy at striker's stumps and they get one for overthrows
Kusal makes room to pull the short ball but misses it
on length outside off, runs it down to third man
on length outside off, chopped wide of third man off the back foot for two to end the over

Kusal is gone and Nicol takes it! Bowled from round the wicket on length outside off, Kusal danced down the track for a big heave on the leg side and managed a leading edge high into the air. Nicol had to go to the left of the pitch to take an easy catch
slightly full on middle, swept to fine leg for one
flighted and full outside off, driven to point
fullish outside off, driven easily to sweeper cover to get off the mark
full toss outside off and Dilshan puts it away easily wide of deep midwicket for four. Easy work for the batsman as he only had to find the gap with the full toss
four more and this one to bring up his fifty. It was pitched around off and he swept it on the other side of deep midwicket to find the boundary once again
on length outside off, pushed straight to mid-off
on length outside off, driven to sweeper cover from the middle of the bat
that's Dilshan's area and he fins the boundary once again! Bouncer was going towards his head and pulled it right on time to hit it to the deep backward square leg boundary for four
on length on off, Dilshan defends after leaning forward
short of length on middle and leg, turned to del long on
the length ball outside off is turned on the leg side for one
fullish outside off, Sangakkara drives on the up and a thick edge goes to third man
short of length on middle, tucked towards midwicket off the hips
full around off, Sangakkara moves across and drives it on the leg side for two
short ball well outside off, cuts it to sweeper cover for an easy single
slightly slow bouncer on middle, pulled to deep backward square leg for one
length delivery outside off is worked straight to point
on length on middle, inside edge goes to the leg side for one
short ball outside leg, clipped past midwicket in the air for a single
going down leg, Dilshan sweeps but gets a leg bye towards short fine leg
another drop! Sanga make room and hit it back to the bowler who failed to hold on to him. It was quick and went though his hands to long-on
full on the stumps and pushed to long-on off the front foot
full on middle and leg, driven to long-on for another single
full outside off, edge off the drive goes to midwicket
comes down the track to clip it to midwicket and Nicol gets a direct hit at Sanga's end to give two overthrows. It's gone to the third umpire but Sanga was well inside
slightly short outside off, Sanga goes back and pulls it in the air just wide of midwicket for two more as long-on runs to cut it
comes down the pitch again and whips this one from length off his pads to deep backward square leg for four in the gap
full on the pads, swept square of short fine leg and they get easy two to seal the chase and the series
